lead_paragraph: A former Philadelphia sportscaster, Don Tollefson, was convicted in Doylestown, Pa., of selling bogus sports-themed trips that he said would help various charities.
snippet: A former Philadelphia sportscaster, Don Tollefson, was convicted in Doylestown, Pa., of selling bogus sports-themed trips that he said would help various charities.

headline.print_headline: Former Philadelphia sportscaster convicted in charity scam
